title: ControlMap

heroMetric.label: Compliance Rate

description: Comprehensive Governance, Risk & Compliance (GRC) platform for MSPs with automated policy tracking, risk assessment, and compliance monitoring
executiveSummary: ControlMap provides comprehensive IT documentation and compliance management for your organization. This quarter, we've successfully tracked 25 endpoints with automated policy compliance monitoring, achieving a compliance score of 78.2% and documentation completeness of 85%. Your organization shows strong progress in policy documentation and compliance tracking, with opportunities for improvement in automated policy enforcement and real-time compliance monitoring.
